products.name: Apple MacBook Pro
products.description: The Apple MacBook Pro is a powerful laptop featuring a stunning Retina display, fast processors, and sleek design. Perfect for professionals and creatives.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is a flagship smartphone with a stunning 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, powerful Snapdragon 888 processor, and a versatile quad-camera setup.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: The Sony PlayStation 5 is the next-generation gaming console featuring lightning-fast load times, immersive 3D audio, and stunning 4K graphics. Get ready for the future of gaming.

products.name: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 Laptop is a compact and powerful device with a virtually borderless InfinityEdge display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and long battery life. Ideal for productivity on the go.

products.name: Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Camera
products.description: The Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Camera is a professional-grade camera with 8K video recording, 45MP full-frame sensor, and advanced autofocus capabilities. Capture stunning images and videos.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 45 Wireless Headphones
products.description: The Bose QuietComfort 45 Wireless Headphones offer best-in-class noise cancellation, superior sound quality, and all-day comfort. Perfect for immersive listening experiences.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Pro 8
products.description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 8 is a versatile 2-in-1 device with a stunning PixelSense display, powerful Intel Core processors, and all-day battery life. Transform from laptop to tablet in seconds.

products.name: LG OLED C1 4K Smart TV
products.description: The LG OLED C1 4K Smart TV delivers stunning picture quality with OLED technology, AI ThinQ for smart functionality, and Dolby Atmos for immersive sound. Bring the theater experience home.

products.name: HP Pavilion Gaming Desktop
products.description: The HP Pavilion Gaming Desktop is built for immersive gaming experiences with powerful processors, NVIDIA GeForce graphics, and customizable RGB lighting. Dominate the competition.

products.name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max is Apple's flagship smartphone with a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and advanced camera system. Capture the world in beautiful detail.

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.description: The Xbox Series X is Microsoft's next-generation gaming console featuring 4K gaming, high frame rates, and quick load times. Experience immersive gaming like never before.

products.name: Samsung QN90A Neo QLED 4K Smart TV
products.description: The Samsung QN90A Neo QLED 4K Smart TV delivers breathtaking picture quality with Quantum Dot technology, Object Tracking Sound, and AI-powered 4K upscaling. Elevate your viewing experience.

products.name: Acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop
products.description: The Acer Nitro 5 Gaming Laptop is designed for gaming with powerful AMD Ryzen processors, NVIDIA GeForce graphics, and high-refresh-rate displays. Dominate the competition wherever you go.

products.name: Google Pixel 6
products.description: The Google Pixel 6 is a flagship smartphone with a stunning 6.4-inch OLED display, advanced camera system, and 5G connectivity. Capture stunning photos and enjoy fast performance.

products.name: Nintendo Switch
products.description: The Nintendo Switch is a versatile gaming console that can be used as a handheld device or connected to a TV. Play your favorite Nintendo games anytime, anywhere.

products.name: Sony BRAVIA XR A90J OLED 4K TV
products.description: The Sony BRAVIA XR A90J OLED 4K TV offers stunning picture quality with XR OLED Contrast Pro, XR Triluminos Pro, and XR Motion Clarity. Experience cinema-grade visuals at home.

products.name: Alienware Aurora R12 Gaming Desktop
products.description: The Alienware Aurora R12 Gaming Desktop is engineered for high-performance gaming with 11th Gen Intel Core processors, NVIDIA GeForce graphics, and Alienware Command Center customization.

products.name: OnePlus 9 Pro
products.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a flagship smartphone with a stunning Fluid AMOLED display, Hasselblad camera system, and fast charging technology. Experience premium performance and design.

products.name: PlayStation VR
products.description: PlayStation VR delivers immersive virtual reality gaming experiences on the PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 consoles. Step into virtual worlds and enjoy innovative gameplay.

products.name: TCL 6-Series 4K QLED TV
products.description: The TCL 6-Series 4K QLED TV offers stunning picture quality with Quantum Dot technology, Dolby Vision HDR, and AiPQ Engine for optimized color and contrast. Enjoy a cinematic viewing experience.
